official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require sponsors of Medicare prescription drug plans to implement procedures to prevent fraud and abuse, and for other purposes.
short_title: Medicare Prescription Drug Integrity Act of 2013

titles.title: Medicare Prescription Drug Integrity Act of 2013
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require sponsors of Medicare prescription drug plans to implement procedures to prevent fraud and abuse, and for other purposes.
